languages.text: {n}Маска чуть опускается, пальцы задумчиво трут подбородок.{/n} "Он любил недуги. Травмы. Патологии. Осложнения. Не любил же он... пожалуй, пациентов. Они мешали ему сосредоточиться на том, что их убивало".

traits.locale_text: {n}Маска чуть опускается, пальцы задумчиво трут подбородок.{/n} "Я любил недуги. Травмы. Патологии. Осложнения. Не любил же я... пожалуй, пациентов. Они мешали сосредоточиться на том, что их убивало".

languages.text: {n}The masked head lowers, and the man strokes his chin contemplatively.{/n} "He was fascinated by diseases. Injuries. Pathogens. Complications. The part he disliked was... the patients. They would not let him concentrate on that which was killing them."
languages.original_text: {n}Маска чуть опускается, пальцы задумчиво трут подбородок.{/n} "Он любил недуги. Травмы. Патологии. Осложнения. Не любил же он... пожалуй, пациентов. Они мешали ему сосредоточиться на том, что их убивало".

traits.locale_text: {n}The masked head lowers, and the man strokes his chin contemplatively.{/n} "He was fascinated by diseases. Injuries. Pathogens. Complications. The part he disliked was... the patients. They would not let him concentrate on that which was killing them."

{n}The masked head is lowered a little. The man is stroking his chin with his fingers pensively.{/n} "I liked diseases. Injuries. Pathologies. Complications. The part I disliked was... patients, I suppose. They would not let me concentrate on that which was killing them." {n}The mask-muffled voice and haughty gestures are a perfect imitation of the late Chirurgeon.{/n}

{n}The masked head bows slightly, and the man strokes his chin pensively.{/n} "I liked diseases. Injuries. Pathogens. Complications. The part I disliked was... the patients, I suppose. They would not let me concentrate on that which was killing them." {n}The mask-muffled voice and haughty gestures are a perfect imitation of the late chirurgeon.{/n}

They would not let me concentrate on that which was killing them." {n}The mask-muffled voice and haughty gestures are a perfect imitation of the late chirurgeon.{/n}

{n}The masked head lowers, and the man strokes his chin contemplatively.{/n} "He was fascinated by diseases. Injuries. Pathogens. Complications. The part he disliked was... the patients. They would not let him concentrate on that which was killing them."

languages.text: {n}L'homme masqué incline la tête avant de se frotter le menton d'un air contemplatif.{/n} « Il a toujours été fasciné par les maladies. Les blessures. Les pathogènes. Les complications. Ce qui lui plaisait moins, en revanche, c'était, eh bien... les patients. Ils l'empêchaient de me concentrer sur ce qui les tuait. »
languages.original_text: {n}The masked head lowers, and the man strokes his chin contemplatively.{/n} "He was fascinated by diseases. Injuries. Pathogens. Complications. The part he disliked was... the patients. They would not let him concentrate on that which was killing them."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'homme masqué incline la tête avant de se frotter le menton d'un air contemplatif.{/n} « Il a toujours été fasciné par les maladies. Les blessures. Les pathogènes. Les complications. Ce qui lui plaisait moins, en revanche, c'était, eh bien... les patients. Ils l'empêchaient de me concentrer sur ce qui les tuait. »

languages.text: {n}La cabeza enmascarada se inclina ligeramente y el hombre se frota pensativo el mentón.{/n} «Le fascinaban las enfermedades. Las lesiones. Los patógenos. Las complicaciones. Lo que menos le gustaba eran... los pacientes. No le dejaban centrarse en aquello que los estaba matando».
languages.original_text: {n}The masked head lowers, and the man strokes his chin contemplatively.{/n} "He was fascinated by diseases. Injuries. Pathogens. Complications. The part he disliked was... the patients. They would not let him concentrate on that which was killing them."

traits.locale_text: {n}La cabeza enmascarada se inclina ligeramente y el hombre se frota pensativo el mentón.{/n} «Le fascinaban las enfermedades. Las lesiones. Los patógenos. Las complicaciones. Lo que menos le gustaba eran... los pacientes. No le dejaban centrarse en aquello que los estaba matando».

languages.text: {n}マスクをつけた顔が下がり、男は考え込むように顎を撫でる。{/n}「彼は病気に魅了されていた。怪我や病原体、合併症に。彼が嫌いだったのは…患者たちだった。彼らは自分たちを殺しているものに集中させてくれなかったんだ。
languages.original_text: {n}The masked head lowers, and the man strokes his chin contemplatively.{/n} "He was fascinated by diseases. Injuries. Pathogens. Complications. The part he disliked was... the patients. They would not let him concentrate on that which was killing them."

traits.locale_text: {n}マスクをつけた顔が下がり、男は考え込むように顎を撫でる。{/n}「彼は病気に魅了されていた。怪我や病原体、合併症に。彼が嫌いだったのは…患者たちだった。彼らは自分たちを殺しているものに集中させてくれなかったんだ。

languages.text: {n}蒙面人低下了头，若有所思地搓着下巴。{/n}“他最喜欢的是疾病本身，伤口、病原体、并发症。至于他不喜欢的部分……应该就是病人吧。他们总是让他分心，让他没法专心对付那些夺走他们生命的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}The masked head lowers, and the man strokes his chin contemplatively.{/n} "He was fascinated by diseases. Injuries. Pathogens. Complications. The part he disliked was... the patients. They would not let him concentrate on that which was killing them."

traits.locale_text: {n}蒙面人低下了头，若有所思地搓着下巴。{/n}“他最喜欢的是疾病本身，伤口、病原体、并发症。至于他不喜欢的部分……应该就是病人吧。他们总是让他分心，让他没法专心对付那些夺走他们生命的东西。”

languages.text: {n}Der maskierte Kopf senkt sich, und der Mann streicht sich nachdenklich über sein Kinn.{/n} "Er war fasziniert von Krankheiten. Verletzungen. Pathogenen. Komplikationen. Was er nicht mochte ... waren wohl ... die Patienten. Wegen ihnen konnte er sich nicht darauf konzentrieren, was sie tötete."
languages.original_text: {n}The masked head lowers, and the man strokes his chin contemplatively.{/n} "He was fascinated by diseases. Injuries. Pathogens. Complications. The part he disliked was... the patients. They would not let him concentrate on that which was killing them."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der maskierte Kopf senkt sich, und der Mann streicht sich nachdenklich über sein Kinn.{/n} "Er war fasziniert von Krankheiten. Verletzungen. Pathogenen. Komplikationen. Was er nicht mochte ... waren wohl ... die Patienten. Wegen ihnen konnte er sich nicht darauf konzentrieren, was sie tötete."

languages.text: {n}Maskeli kafa eğiliyor. Adam, dalgın bir şekilde çenesini sıvazlıyor.{/n} "Hastalıklar, yaralanmalar, patojenler ve komplikasyonlar; ilgisini bir hayli çekiyordu. Sevmediği kısım ise... Hastalardı. Hastaları, kendilerini öldüren şeye konsantre olmasına müsaade etmiyordu."
languages.original_text: {n}The masked head lowers, and the man strokes his chin contemplatively.{/n} "He was fascinated by diseases. Injuries. Pathogens. Complications. The part he disliked was... the patients. They would not let him concentrate on that which was killing them."
